* A DukeException is thrown if there is any error related to Duke the chatbot.
* @param message the message to be printed when a DukeException is thrown and caught.
* A DukeInvalidDeletionException is thrown if the user tries to delete a task that doesn't exist, or if the user
* tries to perform a deletion on an empty task list.
* @param message the message to be printed when a DukeInvalidDeletionException is thrown and caught.
* A DukeInvalidDescriptionException is thrown if the user tries to add a task without giving it either a name or
* description, or if no due date or time is given for Events and Deadlines.
* @param message the message to be printed when a DukeInvalidDescriptionException is thrown and caught.
* A DukeInvalidInputException is thrown if the user gives an unknown input/command.
* Public constructor for a DukeInvalidInputException which will print the standardized message when thrown and
super("â˜¹ OOPS!!! I'm sorry, but I don't know what that means D:");
